5258.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy outlines details about personal information they collect.

5259.quoteText:
Our Site is not intended for children under 13 years of age.
No one under age 13 should provide any personal information to or on the Site.
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
5259.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

14112.quoteText:

Deutsch

Nederlands
14112.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are translated into different languages

14113.quoteText:
This Policy may change from time to time.
any changes we make to this Policy will be posted on this Site, we will also take any other steps, to the extent required by applicable law, including notifying you and/or seeking your explicit consent to material changes.
14113.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes

14114.quoteText: We also collect information from third party vendors and/or other commercially available sources.
14114.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: Information is gathered about you through third parties

14115.quoteText: How Do We Use the Information Collected?
14115.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

tosdr.case: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

14116.quoteText:
We use personal information to provide you with quality service and security, to operate the Site and to perform our obligations to you; to ensure marketplace integrity and security.
to prevent fraud.
to contact you and send you direct marketing communications.
14116.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

14117.quoteText:
We will retain personal information for the following purposes:

  • as long as it is necessary and relevant for our operations, e.g. so that we have an accurate record of your dealings with us in the event of any complaints or challenge. and

  • in relation to personal information from closed accounts to comply with applicable laws, prevent fraud, collect any fees owed, resolve disputes, troubleshoot problems, assist with any investigation, enforce our Site terms and take other actions as permitted by law.
14117.title: This service keeps user logs for an undefined period of time

tosdr.case: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time

14118.quoteText: We share personal information with third parties in order to operate the Site, provide our services to you, fulfil obligations imposed on us by applicable laws and regulations, and prevent fraud, infringements and illegal activities.
14118.title: Your personal data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

14119.quoteText: Some of the personal information you provide to us will be stored or processed on our behalf by third party suppliers and data processors and may be located in other jurisdictions, such as the United States and Israel.
14119.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

14120.quoteText: Personal information will also be disclosed if we go through a business transition such as a merger, sale, transfer of all or a portion of Fiverr's assets, acquisition, bankruptcy or similar event.
14120.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

14121.quoteText: We use cookies and similar technologies (such as web beacons, pixels, tags, and scripts)
14121.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

14122.quoteText: Our Site does not respond to Do Not Track (DNT) signals.
14122.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

14123.quoteText: External Links - the Site contains links to third party sites and if you link to a third party site from the Site, any data you provide to that site and any use of that data by the third party are not under the control of Fiverr and are not subject to this Policy.
14123.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

tosdr.case: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

14124.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

tosdr.case: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

14125.quoteText:
When you register to the Site, use it, complete forms, or use it as collaborator, and/or register to our affiliate or influencer or similar program, we ask you to provide certain personal information, including a valid email address, Facebook or Google account login details and username.
We will also ask you to provide or otherwise collect additional information that you provide us, such as, your profile details, physical address or billing information, telephone number or other contact details, financial information (such as payment method and credit card number), taxpayer information and forms, details about other social networks linked accounts, details about your listed gigs, purchases, education, profession and expertise, and additional authentication information (such as your government issued ID, passport, or driving license, as permitted by applicable laws and as detailed in our Seller Help Center at “Verifying Your Identity”).
14125.title: The service collects many different types of personal data

tosdr.case: Many different types of personal data are collected

14126.quoteText: In other words, when you access the Site we are aware of your usage of the Site, and gather, collect and record the information relating to such usage, including geo-location information
14126.title: This service receives your percise location through GPS coordinates

tosdr.case: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

14127.quoteText: While you view our ads, we gather user Global Unique Identifier, HTTP request data like, user agent, IP, host, URL, country/continent from which request made, browser info, device/operating system/operating system version.
14127.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location

tosdr.case: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

14128.quoteText:
We receive information from third party vendors and/or other commercially available sources, such as:

  • Third party vendors who provide us data to supplement the information we collect about you, in accordance with applicable laws. For example, we receive fraud warnings from service providers for our fraud prevention and risk assessment efforts. We also receive information from enrichment service providers to enhance and personalize your experience as well as from advertising and marketing partners in order to manage and measure our campaigns.

  • If you link, connect, or login to your Fiverr Account with a third-party service (e.g. Google, Facebook, LinkedIn), we receive certain information, such as your registration and profile information from that service. This information varies and is controlled by that service or as authorized by you via your privacy settings at that service.
14128.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

14129.quoteText: to promote and advertise the Site and the Fiverr marketplace.
14129.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
tosdr.tldr:
"We will use your personal information for the following purposes: [...] to promote and advertise the Site and the Fiverr marketplace."
Also, Fiverr works with marketing and advertising partners to provide its advertising.

14130.quoteText: You have a right to prevent direct marketing of any form at any time - this can be exercised by following the opt-out link attached to each communication or by sending an email to optout@fiverr.com.
14130.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

14131.quoteText: We share personal information to law enforcement agencies, public authorities or other parties in order to respond to a subpoena or court order, judicial process or to regulatory authorities, if we believe we are required to do so by law, or that doing so is reasonably necessary to comply with legal processes. when we believe it necessary or appropriate to disclose personal information to law enforcement authorities, such as to investigate actual or suspected fraud or violations of law, breaches of security, or breaches of this Policy. to respond to claims against us. and to protect the rights, property, or personal safety of Fiverr, our customers, or the public;
14131.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

14132.quoteText:
Our Site includes certain social media features, including single sign on features.
We also share limited personal information with such social media platforms and marketing partners, such as Facebook and Google, to promote our services or the Fiverr marketplace.
14132.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

14133.quoteText: Such features and third party services collect certain information about you and may set a cookie to enable their functionality.
14133.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels

tosdr.case: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
tosdr.tldr:
"Our Site includes certain social media features, including single sign on features. We also share limited personal information with such social media platforms and marketing partners, such as Facebook and Google, to promote our services or the Fiverr marketplace.
Such features and third party services collect certain information about you and may set a cookie to enable their functionality."

14134.quoteText: We take great care in maintaining the security of the Site and your information and in preventing unauthorized access, loss, misuse, alteration, destruction or damage to it through industry standard technologies and internal procedures. Among other things, we regularly maintain a PCI DSS (Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards) certification (with respect to payment by credit cards). In addition, we contractually ensure that any third party processing your personal information equally provides for confidentiality and integrity of your data in a secure way.
14134.title: The user is informed about security practices

tosdr.case: Information is provided about security practices

14135.quoteText: Users who have registered to the Site agree to keep their password in strict confidence and not disclose such password to any third party.
14135.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

tosdr.case: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

14136.quoteText:
Rights of EU Users

Under applicable EU regulation, you have the following rights in respect of your personal information:

  • to obtain a copy of your personal information together with information about how and on what basis that personal information is processed;
14136.title: EU users can retrieve an archive of their data

tosdr.case: You can retrieve an archive of your data

14137.quoteText: If you delete your User Generated Content (“UGC”), as defined in the Fiverr Terms of Service, from the Site, copies of your UGC may remain viewable in cached and archived pages, or might have been copied or stored by other Site users.
14137.title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

tosdr.case: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

14138.quoteText: If you have any questions (or comments) concerning this Policy, please email our team at privacy@fiverr.com, and we will make an effort to reply within a reasonable timeframe.
14138.title: The service provides a free help desk

tosdr.case: A free help desk is provided

14139.quoteText: You are solely responsible for any activity on your account and for maintaining the confidentiality and security of your password.
14139.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

14140.quoteText: Gigs and/or users may be removed by Fiverr from the Site for violations of these Terms of Service and/or our Community Standards, which may include (but are not limited to) the following violations and/or materials:
14140.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice

tosdr.case: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
tosdr.tldr: Fiverr reserves the right to delete Gigs for several reasons or for no reason at all: "(but are not limited to)".

14141.quoteText:
>
  • Stock Image(s) may not be used:
    • on a stand-alone basis with no other content;
    • for pornographic,
14141.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

tosdr.case: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

14142.quoteText: Fiverr condemns bullying, harassment, and hate speech towards others.
14142.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

tosdr.case: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

14143.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

tosdr.case: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

14144.quoteText: <li>Fiverr does not handle or guarantee shipping, tracking, quality,
14144.title: This services gives no guarantee regarding quality

tosdr.case: No guarantee is given regarding quality

14145.quoteText: and shall not be responsible or liable for any damages or other problems resulting from shipping.
14145.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

tosdr.case: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

14146.quoteText: • Users are responsible for scanning all transferred files for viruses and malware. Fiverr will not be held responsible for any damages which might occur due to site usage, use of content or files transferred.
14146.title: Users are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses they may incur by downloading materials

tosdr.case: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials

14147.quoteText: There is no warranty, express or implied, with the grant of this license, including with respect to fitness for a particular purpose.
14147.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements

tosdr.case: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements

14148.quoteText: Discrimination against a community member based on gender, race, age, religious affiliation, sexual preference or otherwise is not acceptable and may result in the suspension/removal of your account.
14148.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

14149.quoteText: Any attempts to publish or send malicious content with the intent to compromise another member’s account or computer environment is strictly prohibited.
14149.title: This service prohibits users from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

tosdr.case: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

14150.quoteText:
You may not create a false identity on Fiverr, misrepresent your identity, create a Fiverr profile for anyone other than yourself (a real person), or use or attempt to use another user’s account or information.
Your profile information, including your description, skills, location, etc., while may be kept anonymous, must be accurate and complete and may not be misleading, illegal, offensive or otherwise harmful.
14150.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

tosdr.case: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

14151.quoteText: To prevent fraud and abuse, users are limited to one active Fiverr account and one active Fiverr Business account.
14151.title: Service does not allow alternative accounts

tosdr.case: Alternative accounts are not allowed

14152.quoteText: To the extent that you provide Fiverr with any comments, suggestions or other feedback regarding the Fiverr platform or the Site as a whole, as well as other Fiverr products or services (collective, the “Feedback”), you will be deemed to have granted Fiverr an exclusive, royalty-free, fully paid up, perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide ownership rights in the Feedback.
14152.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them

tosdr.case: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them

14153.quoteText: Users are to refrain from spamming or soliciting previous Buyers or Sellers to pursue removing/modifying reviews or cancelling orders that do not align on Order Cancellation or Feedback policies.
14153.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

tosdr.case: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

14155.quoteText: By uploading to, or creating content on, the Fiverr platform, you represent and warrant that you own or have obtained all rights, licenses, consents, permissions, power and/or authority, necessary to use and/or upload such content and that such content or the use thereof in the Site does not and shall not (a) infringe or violate any intellectual property, proprietary or privacy, data protection or publicity rights of any third party. (b) violate any applicable local, state, federal and international laws, regulations and conventions. and/or (c) violate any of your or third party’s policies and/or terms of service. We invite everyone to report violations together with proof of ownership as appropriate. Reported violating content may be removed or disabled.
14155.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed

tosdr.case: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed

14156.quoteText:
Ownership

Ownership and limitations: When purchasing a Gig on Fiverr, unless clearly stated otherwise on the Seller's Gig page/description, when the work is delivered, and subject to payment, the Buyer is granted all intellectual property rights, including but not limited to, copyright in the work delivered from the Seller, and the Seller waives any and all moral rights therein.
14156.title: You waive your moral rights

tosdr.case: You waive your moral rights

14157.quoteText: Furthermore, users (both Buyers and Sellers) agree that unless they explicitly indicate otherwise, the content users voluntarily create/upload to Fiverr, including Gig texts, photos, videos, usernames, user photos, user videos and any other information, including the display of delivered work, may be used by Fiverr for no consideration for marketing and/or other purposes.
14157.title: The service can use and distribute your content for any purpose

tosdr.case: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future

14158.quoteText:
YOUR USE OF THE SITE, ITS CONTENT AND ANY SERVICES OR ITEMS OBTAINED THROUGH THE WEBSITE IS AT YOUR OWN RISK.
THE SITE, ITS CONTENT AND ANY SERVICES OR ITEMS OBTAINED THROUGH THE WEBSITE ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS,
14158.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
